name: For The Will Of Gods
description:
So, you are the good and kind God who wants to help these little creatures called people to stay alive, but to do this difficult task you have to sacrifice them so the Bad Gods won’t hurt them. So, go and challenge the Bad Gods, what are you waiting for?:)

Little Tutorial:

  • Drag people from house to the Totem to decrease Gods Rage (but you also decrease the people happiness then)
  • The more people there are - the faster Gods Rage will increase
  • If the Gods Rage is full - prepare for the Armageddon!
  • By destroying the doom stones you can stop the Armageddon and increase the people happiness

So, you have to look after the Bad Gods Rage and the people happiness to keep people alive as long as you can
